entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers later in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
